Combat Notes:

Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Extra Bombs: +2/dy
Strength Attack Adjustment: -2
Strength Damage Adjustment: -2
Acid Bomb: Bomb inflicts acid damage instead of fire and direct hit an additional 1d6 HP acid the next round
Bomb: May create bombs that inflict 5d6+1 HP fire on hit and 6 HP fire splash (DC 16 Ref half) 13/dy
Concussive Bomb: Bomb inflicts 5d4 HP sonic instead of fire and direct hit deafens for 1 min (DC 16 Fort neg)
Frost Bomb: Bomb inflicts cold damage instead of fire and direct hit staggers (DC 16 Fort neg)
Heart Of The Wilderness: +5 stabilization checks/Does not die until -22 HP
Swift Alchemy: May apply poison to a weapon as a move action
Swift Poisoning: May apply poison to a weapon as a swift action
Throw Anything (Alchemist): Splash weapons inflict +1 HP damage
Throw Anything: No penalty for improvised ranged weapon, +1 attack w/thrown splash
Save: Fortitude: +10; Reflex: +9; Will: +4

Dexterity Reflex Adjustment: +2
Wisdom Will Adjustment: +1
Poison Resistance: Immune to poison

Magic Notes:
Intelligence Alchemist Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level Alchemist1
Alchemy: May infuse extracts that duplicate spell effects on self for 1 dy
Arcane Spell Failure: 5%
Brew Potion: Create potion for up to 3rd level spell
Enhance Potion: May cause imbibed potion to function at caster level 10 1/dy
Extend Potion: May double duration of imbibed potion 1/dy
Infusion: Created extracts persist when not held and may be used by others
Mutagen: 1 hr process creates potion that gives self +2 AC and +4/-2 to Strength/Intelligence, Dexterity/Wisdom, or Constitution/Charisma for 100 min
Swift Alchemy: May create alchemical items in half normal time
Companions
Companion Notes: Eye For Talent: Animal companion, bonded mount, cohort, or familiar gains +2 on choice of ability
